plot outline: The plot of Ayyanar Veethi involves two warring families, one good and one bad, whose enmity goes back by a generation. A family of evil-doers is determined to bring shame to their rival, and try to exploit a rape committed by one of their members for this purpose!
title: Ayyanar Veethi
plot: The plot of _Ayyanar Veethi_ (qv) involves two warring families, one good and one bad, whose enmity goes back by a generation. A family of evil-doers is determined to bring shame to their rival, and try to exploit a rape committed by one of their members for this purpose!
